tool_description: Provisions and configures database instances with specified engine, version, and performance characteristics for application backends.

db_engine.description: Database engine: mysql, postgresql, mongodb, redis, elasticsearch

backup_retention_days.description: Number of days to retain backups

vpc_security_groups.description: VPC security group IDs for network access control

error_messages: Invalid database engine: Use one of [mysql, postgresql, mongodb, redis, elasticsearch].
Unsupported version: Check supported versions for the selected database engine.
Invalid instance class: Verify instance class is supported by the cloud provider.
Storage size out of range: Must be between 20 and 65536 GB.
Invalid credentials: Username and password must meet complexity requirements.
Backup retention out of range: Must be between 0 and 35 days.
Network configuration error: Verify VPC security group IDs exist and are accessible.
usage: Specify database engine, configuration parameters, and security settings. The tool creates a managed database instance with automated backups and monitoring.

db_instance_id.description: Unique identifier for the database instance

instance_status.description: Current status of the database instance
